biotools.summary: Algorithm that could convert a protein sequence into a digital vector that could be processed by pattern recognition algorithms. The design of this tool incorporated the sequence order information to improve the conventional amino acid compositions. The application of pseudo amino acid composition is very common, including almost every branch of computational proteomics.
